content:
Does anybody have a sense of the general status of _sort implementation on servers out there? Are most able to handle multiple "columns" and, if not, is returning a 500 a regular occurrence?

I'm asking because Grahame's server returns a 500 when trying things like Patient?_sort=family,given, so I'm trying to get a sense whether it would make sense to anticipate such errors.
I should handle it. can you create a task on https://github.com/grahamegrieve/fhirserver please
